name: Bar:None
description:
Good news inmate, the trash has hit the fan. You've spent the last 13 years cooped up in this illegal experimental prison, where the scientists have been having a blast seeing just how much muscle they can pack into you. Now that everybody is loose, it's about time to put that muscle to good use.

FEATURES:

- Fast, frantic, reaction-based combat. Everything dies in one hit, including you.

- 4 story mode levels that introduce you to the enemies and mechanics of the game, and then a difficult boss fight to truly test your skill.

- An arena mode where you can sharpen your skills at fighting enemies

- A unique psuedo-3d visual style

- Quick restarting so you can get back in there and die again

Thank you for reading this page, and I hope that you have fun playing :) try not to get too mad.

CREDITS: 

Sound effects: Daniel SoundsGood - @danielsoundsgood

Music: BellKalengar - https://itch.io/profile/bellkalengar
